tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_address VARCHAR(255),
    deployment_date DATE,
    creator_address VARCHAR(255),
    is_active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE contract_events (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  event_description TEXT,
  event_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  contract_id UUID REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_type VARCHAR(50),
    deployment_date DATE,
    creator_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_date DATE,
    event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE contract_investors (
    investor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    investor_name VARCHAR(255),
    investment_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    investment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE contract_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE contract_metadata (
    metadata_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    metadata_key VARCHAR(255),
    metadata_value TEXT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);
